body.name: Avolusion PRO-5X 4TB USB 3.0 External Hard Drive for PC, Mac, Playstation & Xbox (Grey) - 2 Year Warranty
features: Built-in 4TB Capacity USB 3.0 External Hard Drive
Compatible with Windows OS, MacOS, PlayStation, XBOX (exFAT File System Pre-Formatted, re-format required for game console)
Expand computer hard drive storage instantly! Add extra storage to your device without opening up the case
Perfect for hard drive expansion and backup storage for your entire Windows OS system! (Do it before it crash, you never know when it will happen! "Daily schedule backup is no longer optional" )

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Avolusion PRO-5X USB 3.0 External Hard Drive for PC, Mac, Playstation & Xbox (Grey) Built-in massive HDD Capacity USB 3.0 External Hard Drive Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive is the value hard drive upgrade kit provides the best and easy solution to expand your Desktop PC, Laptop, (Windows , MacOS), PlayStation or XBOX Game console. (HDD Re-format required) USB 3.0 port to expand your device capacity instantly! Plug and Play USB 3.0 interface providing a perfect portable storage solution for you to store & backup your game data, music, picture, video and more! Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive designed to work with your Windows OS Desktop PC, Laptop, PS & XBOX Game console perfectly! It comes with silent fan-less design to keep your External Hard Drive operate quietly!Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive Upgrade Kit features high-quality construction, advanced external interface technology, durable chassis and state-of-the-art industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable performance. [Attention XBOX Series X|S & PS5 Users] Due to the new games required high performance SSD to play direct from game console, therefore any External Hard Drive on XBOX Series X|S or Playstation 5 is only use as "buffer storage"for latest games. (not restricted to old XBOX One or PS4 Games)You can play Xbox One / PS4 games directly from USB extended storage, which lets you save space on your XBOX Series X|S or PS5 console storage for new XBOX X|S or PS5 games. To play XBOX X|S or PS5 games, you need to copy game data from your USB extended storage drive back to your game console's internal SSD storage. It’s much quicker to copy a XBOX X|S or PS5 game from USB extended storage than to re-download it.Compatible with XBOX Series X|S or PS5 Game Console, Expand game console storage instantly! NOTE: You cannot download X|S or PS5 games direct to USB Hard Drive, It has to download to internal SSD and then "Move/Copy" to USB HDD after that. (about 3 ~ 5 min transfer a game)XBOX X|S or PS5 Game has to play on internal SSD, you can "Move & Store" your PS5 Games from SSD to USB HDD when you're not play it. And it's always faster than re-download it online. That will free up your Internal SSD Space for more games.

Build-in massive HDD Capacity External Hard Drive Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Hard Drive is the value hard drive upgrade kit provides the best and easy solution to expand your PC, Laptop or game console storage! Plug & Play USB 3.0 interface providing a perfect solution to store & backup your game data, music, picture, video & more!

Easy Upgrade Solution to expand storage capacity Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Gaming Hard Drive Upgrade Kit features high-quality construction, advanced external interface technology, durable chassis and state-of-the-art elegant & stylish industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable performance.

Add extra storage to your device Without opening up the case.

Highlights SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Interface Avolusion PRO-5X Series External Gaming HDD is using 7200RPM HDD. It's generally 33% faster than the 5400RPM HDD. Therefore, you can store & play XBOX One's game direct from External Hard Drive. This will free up more space on game console's Internal SSD storage! Build-in HDD Capacity Store massive amount of data, games, videos, music easily! *e.g 4TB HDD store up to 50+ games. Friendly Reminder: Daily Backup your computer is no longer optional, it's essential! Excellent Heat Dissipation Silent fan-less design to keep your External Gaming Hard Drive operate quietly! Stylish Design Designed to stand vertically or horizontal. Durable chassis and state-of-the-art industrial design, assured to provide you with years of reliable

Hard Drive actual formatted capacity: HDD manufacturers market HDD in decimal (base 10) capacity. PlayStation use binary (base 2). So, when measure a kilobyte as 1,000 bytes, software refers to a kilobyte as 1,024 bytes. Therefore HDD vs Capacity: 4TB ~ 3.638 TB | 6TB ~ 5.457 TB | 8TB ~ 7.276 TB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Se lo compre para mi hermanito, facil de usar, lijeron a comparacion de otros y su precio accesible👌🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super great external drive
reviews.reviewText: Runs fast and very quiet. Enough room to download a very large movies collection, 90% in Blue-Ray. Easy to install and have it running in less than 3 minutes. I will buy another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not last..
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of them and they stopped working in 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked out of box
reviews.reviewText: Said on the listing information compatible with MAC. I didn't notice it said to format it in the manual until after I used it. Worked anyway. Good item. Not terribly fast, however.
